name: Smartping AI
description:
Founded in 2015, Smartping is a leading UCaaS (Unified Communication as a Service) platform that empowers pan-Indian businesses with scalable multi-channel communication services. With 5000+ customers, Smartping aims to revolutionize enterprise communication through our advanced capabilities for multi-channel engagement, which are: SMS Solutions, Voice Solutions, WhatsApp Business Messaging, Cloud Contact Center Solutions, Conversational AI & RCS.  
Leverage Smartping's WhatsApp Business Messaging capabilities to seamlessly manage automated customer conversations, build targeted marketing campaigns & enhance the overall customer experience.  

- Drive large-scale marketing campaigns that convert 
- Provide 1-on-1 personalized experiences 
- Seamless customer assistance with multilingual support and automated replies. 
- Deliver higher ROI and superior customer experiences

Connect with us at hello@smartping.ai and 1800 911 1111 
Visit our website for more information - www.smartping.ai
